author: wn.com
title: Matlins create Lillian S. Hatate Scholarship for UH student-athletes (The University of Hawaii System)
text: ( Source : The University of Hawaii System ) Lillian S. Hatate University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa athletics director David Matlin and his wife, Dana , have pledged $35, 000 to create the Lillian S. Hatate Scholarship Endowment . This scholarship will
